author: Reuters Editorial
title: New York reports deadliest day from virus, makes plea for help
description: New York suffered its deadliest single day from the novel coronavirus, with 562 additional deaths across the state for a total of 2,935 fatalities, Governor Andrew Cuomo said on Friday.
content:
(Reuters) - New York suffered its deadliest single day from the novel coronavirus, with 562 additional deaths across the state for a total of 2,935 fatalities, Governor Andrew Cuomo said on Friday. 
Cuomo warned that people were going to die in the near term… [+288 chars]
